name: Unexpected Errors
description:
NOTICE: If you are having issues, make sure you are using a recent version of either Google Chrome or Firefox. Safari may not be fully supported.

NOTICE: You may have to click inside the game window to enable keyboard control.

Help save the computer from the pesky errors!

Use the arrow keys and enter key to select a level.

Collect the green check mark in each level by using the arrow keys (or WASD) to move and the space bar to jump.

Complete all the levels to see how it ends.

Refresh the browser page to play again.

Thanks for playing!
